commit.message: Add const where it makes sense

Fix: restore with arguments now property parses input with whitespace

Introduced a pseudo property, -DCRaCJavaMainArgs, that is set in
JavaMain. An instance of JavaMainArgs is stored as extra info of
the property, which is extracted in Arguments::parse_options_for_restore
and passed to crac::restore.

Refactor: remove side effects from CracRestoreParameters

CracRestoreParameters now perform only serialization/deserialzation.
Other side effects are moved to the calling site.
The serialization format is modified to accommodate multiple
GrowableArrays.
